languages.text: "Возможно, я недостаточно точно выразился..." {n}Хейнрикс чуть наклоняется вперед и в упор заглядывает вам в глаза.{/n} "В отсутствие Лорд-инквизитора я есть волеизъявление Священного Ордоса. Инквизиция не допустит свершения поганого предсказания, обещающего гибель целой планеты. И я не покину систему Райкад, пока подобная угроза не будет устранена".

traits.locale_text: "Возможно, я недостаточно точно выразился..." {n}Хейнрикс чуть наклоняется вперед и в упор заглядывает вам в глаза.{/n} "В отсутствие Лорда-инквизитора я есть волеизъявление священного Ордоса. Инквизиция не допустит свершения поганого предсказания, обещающего гибель целой планеты. И я не покину систему Райкада, пока подобрая угроза не будет устранена".

languages.text: "Perhaps I haven't made myself sufficiently clear..." {n}Heinrix leans forward a little and looks you dead in the eye.{/n} "In the Lord Inquisitor's absence, it is I who embody the will of the Holy Ordos. The Inquisition is fully intent on thwarting the vile prophecy that threatens doom for an entire planet. And I am not leaving the Rykad System until any such threat is removed."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, я недостаточно точно выразился..." {n}Хейнрикс чуть наклоняется вперед и в упор заглядывает вам в глаза.{/n} "В отсутствие Лорд-инквизитора я есть волеизъявление Священного Ордоса. Инквизиция не допустит свершения поганого предсказания, обещающего гибель целой планеты. И я не покину систему Райкад, пока подобная угроза не будет устранена".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps I haven't made myself sufficiently clear..." {n}Heinrix leans forward a little and looks you dead in the eye.{/n} "In the Lord Inquisitor's absence, it is I who embody the will of the Holy Ordos. The Inquisition is fully intent on thwarting the vile prophecy that has promised doom upon an entire planet. And I am not leaving the Rykad system until any such threat is removed."

"Perhaps I haven't made myself sufficiently clear..." {n}Heinrix leans forward a little and looks you dead in the eye.{/n} "In the Lord Inquisitor's absence, it is I who embody the will of the Holy Ordos. The Inquisition is fully intent on thwarting the vile prophecy that has promised doom upon an entire planet. And I am not leaving the Rykad system until any such threat is removed."

The Inquisition is fully intent on thwarting the vile prophecy that threatens doom for an entire planet. And I am not leaving the Rykad System until any such threat is removed."

"Perhaps I haven't made myself sufficiently clear..." {n}Heinrix leans forward a little and looks you dead in the eye.{/n} "In the Lord Inquisitor's absence, it is I who embody the will of the Holy Ordos. The Inquisition is fully intent on thwarting the vile prophecy that threatens doom for an entire planet. And I am not leaving the Rykad System until any such threat is removed."

"Perhaps I haven't made myself sufficiently clear..." {n}Heinrix leans forward a little and looks you dead in the eye.{/n} "In the Lord Inquisitor's absence, it is I who embody the will of the Holy Ordos. The Inquisition is fully intent on thwarting the vile prophecy that threatens doom for an entire planet. And I am not leaving the Rykad System until any such threat is removed."

languages.text: “或许我刚刚没有说得非常清楚……”{n}海因里希向前倾了倾，死死地盯着你的双眼。{/n}“大审判官大人不在的时候，由我来行使审判庭的意志。那个卑鄙的预言对整颗行星构成了威胁，而审判庭打算不遗余力来挫败这个预言。在任何与此相关的威胁被根除之前，我都不打算离开莱卡德星系。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I haven't made myself sufficiently clear..." {n}Heinrix leans forward a little and looks you dead in the eye.{/n} "In the Lord Inquisitor's absence, it is I who embody the will of the Holy Ordos. The Inquisition is fully intent on thwarting the vile prophecy that threatens doom for an entire planet. And I am not leaving the Rykad System until any such threat is removed."

traits.locale_text: “或许我刚刚没有说得非常清楚……”{n}海因里希向前倾了倾，死死地盯着你的双眼。{/n}“审判长大人不在的时候，由我来行使审判庭的意志。那个卑鄙的预言对整颗行星构成了威胁，而审判庭打算不遗余力来挫败这个预言。在任何与此相关的威胁被根除之前，我都不打算离开莱卡德星系。”

languages.text: 「おそらく、私のことをハッキリと分かってもらうことはできないが…」{n}ハインリックスは少し前かがみになり、あなたの目をじっと見つめる。{/n}「ロード・インクィジターの不在中、神聖なる〈純血の団〉の意志を体現するのは私だ。異端審問庁は、惑星全体の破滅を脅かす卑劣な予言を阻止することに全力を尽くしているのだ。そして、そのような脅威が取り除かれるまで、私はライカド星系を離れることはない」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I haven't made myself sufficiently clear..." {n}Heinrix leans forward a little and looks you dead in the eye.{/n} "In the Lord Inquisitor's absence, it is I who embody the will of the Holy Ordos. The Inquisition is fully intent on thwarting the vile prophecy that threatens doom for an entire planet. And I am not leaving the Rykad System until any such threat is removed."

traits.locale_text: 「おそらく、私のことをハッキリと分かってもらうことはできないが…」{n}ハインリックスは少し前かがみになり、あなたの目をじっと見つめる。{/n}「ロード・インクィジターの不在中、神聖なる〈純血の団〉の意志を体現するのは私だ。異端審問庁は、惑星全体の破滅を脅かす卑劣な予言を阻止することに全力を尽くしているのだ。そして、そのような脅威が取り除かれるまで、私はライカド星系を離れることはない」

languages.text: "Vielleicht habe ich mich nicht klar genug ausgedrückt ..." {n}Heinrix beugt sich ein Stück nach vorne und blickt dir direkt in die Augen.{/n} "In Abwesenheit des Großinquisitors verkörpere ich den Willen der Heiligen Ordos. Die Inquisition will die abseitige Prophezeiung nichtig machen, die einen ganzen Planeten mit dem Untergang bedroht. Und ich verlasse das Rykad-System erst, wenn diese Bedrohung entfernt ist."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I haven't made myself sufficiently clear..." {n}Heinrix leans forward a little and looks you dead in the eye.{/n} "In the Lord Inquisitor's absence, it is I who embody the will of the Holy Ordos. The Inquisition is fully intent on thwarting the vile prophecy that threatens doom for an entire planet. And I am not leaving the Rykad System until any such threat is removed."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht habe ich mich nicht klar genug ausgedrückt ..." {n}Heinrix beugt sich ein Stück nach vorne und blickt dir direkt in die Augen.{/n} "In Abwesenheit des Großinquisitors verkörpere ich den Willen der Heiligen Ordos. Die Inquisition will die abseitige Prophezeiung nichtig machen, die einen ganzen Planeten mit dem Untergang bedroht. Und ich verlasse das Rykad-System erst, wenn diese Bedrohung entfernt ist."

languages.text: « Peut-être ne me suis-je pas fait suffisamment comprendre... » {n}Heinrix se penche légèrement en avant et plante son regard dans le vôtre.{/n} « En l'absence du seigneur inquisiteur, je suis l'incarnation du Saint Ordo. L'Inquisition a la ferme intention de déjouer l'ignoble prophétie qui menace d'anéantissement une planète entière. Je ne quitterai pas le système Rykad tant que cette menace n'aura pas été écartée. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I haven't made myself sufficiently clear..." {n}Heinrix leans forward a little and looks you dead in the eye.{/n} "In the Lord Inquisitor's absence, it is I who embody the will of the Holy Ordos. The Inquisition is fully intent on thwarting the vile prophecy that threatens doom for an entire planet. And I am not leaving the Rykad System until any such threat is removed."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être ne me suis-je pas fait suffisamment comprendre... » {n}Heinrix se penche légèrement en avant et plante son regard dans le vôtre.{/n} « En l'absence du seigneur inquisiteur, je suis l'incarnation du Saint Ordo. L'Inquisition a la ferme intention de déjouer l'ignoble prophétie qui menace d'anéantissement une planète entière. Je ne quitterai pas le système Rykad tant que cette menace n'aura pas été écartée. »

languages.text: «Tal vez no me haya explicado con la suficiente claridad...». {n}Heinrix se inclina ligeramente hacia delante para mirarte directamente a los ojos.{/n} «En ausencia del Lord Inquisidor, yo represento la voluntad de los Santos Ordos. La Inquisición está decidida a evitar que se cumpla la repugnante profecía que pretende condenar a todo un planeta, y no abandonaré el sistema Rykad hasta haber eliminado dicha amenaza».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I haven't made myself sufficiently clear..." {n}Heinrix leans forward a little and looks you dead in the eye.{/n} "In the Lord Inquisitor's absence, it is I who embody the will of the Holy Ordos. The Inquisition is fully intent on thwarting the vile prophecy that threatens doom for an entire planet. And I am not leaving the Rykad System until any such threat is removed."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez no me haya explicado con la suficiente claridad...». {n}Heinrix se inclina ligeramente hacia delante para mirarte directamente a los ojos.{/n} «En ausencia del Lord Inquisidor, yo represento la voluntad de los Santos Ordos. La Inquisición está decidida a evitar que se cumpla la repugnante profecía que pretende condenar a todo un planeta, y no abandonaré el sistema Rykad hasta haber eliminado dicha amenaza».

languages.original_text: "Perhaps I haven't made myself sufficiently clear..." {n}Heinrix leans forward a little and looks you dead in the eye.{/n} "In the Lord Inquisitor's absence, it is I who embody the will of the Holy Ordos. The Inquisition is fully intent on thwarting the vile prophecy that threatens doom for an entire planet. And I am not leaving the Rykad System until any such threat is removed."

languages.text: "Kendimi yeterince açık ifade edemedim galiba." {n}Heinrix biraz öne eğilip gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Lord Engizisyoncu'nun yokluğunda, Kutsal Nizam'in iradesini ben temsil ediyorum. Engizisyon, koca bir gezegenin sonunu getirebilecek bu habis kehaneti önlemeye son derece kararlı. Bu tehdit ortadan kalkana kadar Rykad Sistemi'nden ayrılmaya niyetim yok."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I haven't made myself sufficiently clear..." {n}Heinrix leans forward a little and looks you dead in the eye.{/n} "In the Lord Inquisitor's absence, it is I who embody the will of the Holy Ordos. The Inquisition is fully intent on thwarting the vile prophecy that threatens doom for an entire planet. And I am not leaving the Rykad System until any such threat is removed."

Engizisyon, koca bir gezegenin sonunu getirebilecek bu habis kehaneti önlemeye son derece kararlı. Bu tehdit ortadan kalkana kadar Rykad Sistemi'nden ayrılmaya niyetim yok."
